prompt: Straight-on, eye-level view of a small independent boutique interior with a large plaster wall painted in soft teal limewash, subtly shifting from pale teal near the ceiling to medium teal toward the floor. Soft morning window light creates a gentle top-to-bottom tonal gradient on the real wall surface. A stylish customer (mid-30s, East Asian woman) stands near the right edge browsing a simple clothes rack of neutral linens. Minimal, real furnishings: a light wood bench and a single potted plant at the lower left. Clean, uncluttered negative space across most of the wall. Natural color palette, no screens, no signage, no posters, no whiteboards, no text.

Professional headshot of Marcus Rodriguez, middle-aged Hispanic male security director, confident warm smile; airport security workplace setting with frosted glass walls, stainless steel railings, and a metal detector arch softly blurred in the background; navy suit jacket and light blue dress shirt, no tie, neat grooming; head-and-shoulders crop, subject angled slightly left while looking into camera; soft natural window light with gentle catchlights and subtle rim light; shot on an 85mm prime at f/2 for shallow depth of field; portrait orientation; natural color grading, realistic skin texture; clean environment with only real objects; no screens, no visible text or signage, no posters, no whiteboards, no logos.

Editorial corporate headshot of Marcus Rodriguez, middle-aged Hispanic male security director, relaxed confident expression; airport security office corridor with glass partitions, polished floors, and queue stanchions bokeh in the background; charcoal suit and white shirt, hands out of frame; three-quarter head-and-shoulders, slight right-facing angle; warm diffused overhead light balanced with soft side fill; shot on a 105mm portrait lens, shallow depth of field; portrait orientation; natural colors and subtle contrast; environment only real objects; no screens, no visible text, no posters, no logos.

Professional headshot of Sarah Chen, Asian female operations manager, confident focused expression; power plant floor backdrop with large pipes, yellow safety handrails, and metal catwalks softly blurred; light gray collared shirt with an unbranded high-visibility vest, unbranded white hard hat worn; head-and-shoulders crop, facing camera straight-on; soft daylight from high windows with gentle fill, clean highlights; 85mm lens at f/2 for creamy bokeh; portrait orientation; realistic color and skin tones; real objects only; no screens, no visible text or signage, no posters, no logos.

Photorealistic professional headshot of a fictional security chief named David Thompson, middle-aged white male (late 40s), short salt-and-pepper hair, clean-shaven, serious and composed expression; plain navy uniform shirt with shoulder epaulettes and a blank metal badge shape (no text or logos); correctional facility office setting in the background: pale cinderblock wall, metal filing cabinet, reinforced window with bars softly blurred; soft cool window light, shallow depth of field (85mm lens look, f/2), head-and-shoulders crop, subject centered; natural skin texture; no text, no signage, no screens, no posters, no whiteboards, no logos, only real objects.
